ai-tha-ap174:1.2_0: the world, for the world of the gods,
ai-tha-ap174:1.3_0: I stay for the benefit of the stilt longhouse
ai-tha-ap174:2.4_0: to the teaching of the Buddha.
ai-tha-ap174:3.1_0: they lie down in the same forest,
ai-tha-ap174:3.3_0: several kings there were a king,
ai-tha-ap174:4.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
ai-tha-ap174:5.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Nādika.
ai-tha-ap174:6.1_0: The senior by a calminent, a second,
